Package com.bookingmx.reservation.util

Class DateValidator

java.lang.Object
com.bookingmx.reservation.util.DateValidator
public class DateValidator extends Object
Utility class for validating dates in the reservation system. This class provides static methods for common date validation operations such as checking if dates are in the past, validating date ranges, and ensuring business rules are met. All methods are static and the class cannot be instantiated.
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
BookingMx Development Team

  • Field Details

    • MINIMUM_NIGHTS

      public static final int MINIMUM_NIGHTS
      Minimum number of nights required for a reservation. This constant defines the business rule for minimum stay duration.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • MAXIMUM_ADVANCE_DAYS

      public static final int MAXIMUM_ADVANCE_DAYS
      Maximum number of days in advance a reservation can be made. This constant limits how far into the future reservations can be created.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Method Details

    • isPastDate

      public static boolean isPastDate(LocalDate date)
      Checks if a given date is in the past (before today).
      Parameters:
      date - the date to check
      Returns:
      true if the date is before today, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if date is null

    • isToday

      public static boolean isToday(LocalDate date)
      Checks if a given date is today.
      Parameters:
      date - the date to check
      Returns:
      true if the date is today, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if date is null

    • isFutureDate

      public static boolean isFutureDate(LocalDate date)
      Checks if a given date is in the future (after today).
      Parameters:
      date - the date to check
      Returns:
      true if the date is after today, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if date is null

    • isValidCheckInDate

      public static boolean isValidCheckInDate(LocalDate checkInDate)
      Validates that a check-in date is valid for a new reservation. A valid check-in date must be today or in the future, and not exceed the maximum advance booking period.
      Parameters:
      checkInDate - the check-in date to validate
      Returns:
      true if the check-in date is valid, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if checkInDate is null

    • isValidCheckOutDate

      public static boolean isValidCheckOutDate(LocalDate checkInDate, LocalDate checkOutDate)
      Validates that a check-out date is after the check-in date. The check-out must be at least one day after check-in to meet the minimum nights requirement.
      Parameters:
      checkInDate - the check-in date
      checkOutDate - the check-out date
      Returns:
      true if check-out is validly after check-in, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if either date is null

    • meetsMinimumNights

      public static boolean meetsMinimumNights(LocalDate checkInDate, LocalDate checkOutDate)
      Validates that a date range meets the minimum nights requirement.
      Parameters:
      checkInDate - the check-in date
      checkOutDate - the check-out date
      Returns:
      true if the date range meets minimum nights, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if either date is null

    • isValidDateRange

      public static boolean isValidDateRange(LocalDate checkInDate, LocalDate checkOutDate)
      Validates a complete date range for a reservation. This method combines all date validation rules: - Check-in date must be valid (not in past, not too far in future) - Check-out date must be after check-in date - Date range must meet minimum nights requirement
      Parameters:
      checkInDate - the check-in date to validate
      checkOutDate - the check-out date to validate
      Returns:
      true if the entire date range is valid, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if either date is null

    • calculateNights

      public static long calculateNights(LocalDate checkInDate, LocalDate checkOutDate)
      Calculates the number of nights between two dates.
      Parameters:
      checkInDate - the check-in date
      checkOutDate - the check-out date
      Returns:
      the number of nights as a long value
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if either date is null or checkout is before checkin

    • doDateRangesOverlap

      public static boolean doDateRangesOverlap(LocalDate start1, LocalDate end1, LocalDate start2, LocalDate end2)
      Checks if two date ranges overlap. This is useful for checking room availability - if a room has an existing reservation, we need to ensure new reservations don't overlap.
      Parameters:
      start1 - start date of first range
      end1 - end date of first range
      start2 - start date of second range
      end2 - end date of second range
      Returns:
      true if the date ranges overlap, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any date is null

    • getDateValidationMessage

      public static String getDateValidationMessage(LocalDate checkInDate, LocalDate checkOutDate)
      Gets a descriptive validation message for invalid date ranges. This method provides user-friendly error messages for different date validation failures.
      Parameters:
      checkInDate - the check-in date to validate
      checkOutDate - the check-out date to validate
      Returns:
      a descriptive error message, or null if dates are valid

    • formatDateRange

      public static String formatDateRange(LocalDate checkInDate, LocalDate checkOutDate)
      Formats a date range as a readable string.
      Parameters:
      checkInDate - the check-in date
      checkOutDate - the check-out date
      Returns:
      a formatted string representing the date range
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if either date is null
